welcome_message_body: Welcome to New York, where the vibrant cityscape meets the charm of iconic landmarks like the Statue of Liberty and the bright lights of Times Square. We hope you enjoy exploring everything this amazing city has to offer!

restaurants.name: New Park Pizza
restaurants.description: New Park Pizza is a pizzeria located in Howard Beach.
restaurants.address: 15671 Crossbay Blvd (at 157th Ave), Howard Beach, NY 11414

restaurants.name: Trini Delite
restaurants.description: Trini Delite is a caribbean restaurant located in South Richmond Hill.
restaurants.address: 11002 Liberty Ave (110th), South Richmond Hill, NY 11419

restaurants.name: Gyro King
restaurants.description: Gyro King is a mediterranean restaurant located in Brooklyn.
restaurants.address: 984 Coney Island Ave (Newkirk Ave), Brooklyn, NY 11230

restaurants.name: Gino's Pizzeria & Restaurant
restaurants.description: Gino's Pizzeria & Restaurant is a pizzeria located in Howard Beach.

restaurants.name: Lenny's Clam Bar
restaurants.description: Lenny's Clam Bar is a seafood restaurant located in Howard Beach.
restaurants.address: 16103 Crossbay Blvd (at 161st Ave), Howard Beach, NY 11414

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for airlines such as American Airlines, JetBlue, and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights for airlines such as Delta Air Lines, United Airlines, and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as American Airlines, JetBlue, and Frontier Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1

terminals.name: Terminal 2

terminals.name: Terminal 4

terminals.name: Terminal 5

terminals.name: Terminal 7

terminals.name: Terminal 8

wifi.note: Limited free access, premium options available for purchase

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to private jets and their passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.
